title: A Handful of T206 SGC 40 VG Commons
author: BlueDevil89

posts.post_title: A Handful of T206 SGC 40 VG Commons
posts.post_content:
Prices are delivered (includes tracking)...

1 Card - $49.00
2 Cards - $95.00
3 Cards - $135.00
4 Cards - $179.00
5 Cards - $220.00

NOTE:  Al Bridwell (Portrait, No Cap) has been SOLD.  All other cards still available.

Adding a few more options to make it a fuller handful to choose from...
